mapper.select: select `id`,`team_users_record_id`,`number`,`user_name`,`age`, gender, `technical_position`,`work_company`,`research_field`,`team_work_time_len`,`user_type`,`opt_uid`,`task_id`,`created` from ass_enterpri_team_users_list where id = #{value}

mapper.delete:

#{id}
